articles.description: Jhon Duran's late winner gives Aston Villa a famous victory over Bayern Munich in the Champions League at Villa Park.
articles.title: Aston Villa 1-0 Bayern Munich: Champions League report, team news & updates

articles.description: Arne Slot's first home Champions League match as Liverpool boss ends in victory as the Reds defeat battling Italian side Bologna at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool 2-0 Bologna: Arne Slot wins first Champions League tie at Anfield

articles.description: Holders Real Madrid fall to their first Champions League defeat since May 2023 against Lille at the Pierre-Mauroy Stadium.
articles.title: Lille 1-0 Real Madrid: Holders suffer shock Champions League loss

articles.description: Jos Buttler returns from injury to lead England on their tour of West Indies, which starts on 31 October, while leg-spinner Jafer Chohan earns his first call-up.
articles.title: England in West Indies: Jafer Chohan earns first call-up and Jos Buttler returns from injury

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Benfica vs Atlético Madrid in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Benfica vs Atlético Madrid: Champions League score, stats & updates

articles.description: England have their "best chance in a long time" according to former World Cup winner Alex Hartley. BBC Sport and data analysts CricViz look at why they can win the T20 World Cup and who are their chief threats.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup preview: Why this is England's 'best chance' and how they compare to Australia and India

articles.description: Chris Sutton and John Murray reflect on Aston Villa’s incredible 1-0 win over Bayern Munich in the Champions League.
articles.title: Aston Villa 1-0 Bayern Munich: Chris Sutton analyses Villa win

articles.description: Girona score two own goals and miss a penalty as they fall to a narrow defeat in their first Champions League home match.
articles.title: Girona 2-3 Feyenoord: Girona score two own goals and miss penalty in Champions League defeat

articles.description: Rory McIlroy hopes the presence at the Dunhill Links Championship of the men involved in talks aimed at ending the split in men's professional golf is a "good sign".
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: World number three to tee up with key duo involved in LIV talks

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz comes from a set down to edge out world number one Jannik Sinner in a dramatic China Open final.
articles.title: China Open: Carlos Alcaraz recovers to beat Jannik Sinner in dramatic final
